availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Decator Crowley (Henderson + webster county farmer )

body.p: Henderson County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Edmund Crowley and Clementine Crowley. Married to Mary "Polly" Ann Thompson Crowley in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1858. Father of Frances M. Crowley, Jane Crowley, and Edmund Crowley. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 310B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 521.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 1, p. 163B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #000576460, p. 497.
"William Decator Crowley (1832-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #49063604, accessed July 21, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49063604.
